name: Hyderabadi Biryani
disc: Straight from the streets of Hyderabad, get the authentic flavours simmering in your kitchen. One of the most popular biryani recipes, this dish is surely here to win hearts. It's nothing but half-boiled rice layered with fried onions, mint, cooked meat and cooked dum style.

name: Keema Biryani
disc: Cook up a storm by combining minced lamb with aromatic spices and crunchy nuts. Keema biryani is the delicious amalgamation of rice with aromatic spices and minced meat, dry fruits and rose water that is a delight to relish on.

name: Chicken Reshmi Biryani
disc: Explore the burst of flavours enrobed in a mix of chicken and rice. A simple recipe, chicken reshmi biryani is everything you need to celebrate Eid.

name: Makhni Paneer Biryani
disc: Tender paneer pieces cooked to perfection in a hearty mix of rice and local spices. Doused in a creamy texture, this special treat will please one and all.

name: Calicut Chicken Biryani
disc: From the beautiful city of Calicut, comes this authentic chicken Biryani. A quick and easy recipe using chicken and rice with distinct flavours of South. Yes, perfect biryani does exist.

name: Scheherazade Biryani | Fish Biryani
disc: Surprise all by serving this authentic Iranian Biryani at your dinner table. Succulent fish pieces are cooked together in spices and a generous helping of nuts.

name: Murgh Ki Kachchi Biryani
disc: This one is a must try for all the chicken lovers. Raw chicken pieces are marinated and cooked with rice dum style - simply lip-smacking!

name: Chicken Biryani With Coconut Milk
disc: This one is a heartwarming combination of spices and condiments simmering with chicken pieces and rice. An added dose of coconut milk makes this one a creamy, aromatic treat.

name: Microwave Machchli Biryani
disc: Beautiful fish pieces layered with rice and truckloads of flavours - this one will steal you all the praises! If you are bored with your usual chicken and mutton biryani, it is time you get hooked on to fish biryani and surprise your guests this festival.

name: Malabar Fish Biryani
disc: Dum cooked birynai loaded with flavorful, tangy fried fish and aromatic spices along with rich cashew nuts. Can it get any better? A delicious Biryani recipe from the authentic and popular kitchen of Malabar.

name: Handi Biryani
disc: A slow-cooked, delectable chicken biryani recipe full of aromatic flavours and layered with masalas, milk, chicken and vegetables cooked in a Handi which is a round pot like vessel, with the neck narrower than the base. A mouth-watering dish that will surely win hearts at the dinner table
